parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for object intersection with a virtual line between two positions. Returns true if intersects with an object.

<br><br>'''NOTE:''' Doesn't work under water. Max harcoded distance is 1000m.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lineIntersects''' [begPos, endPos, objIgnore1, objIgnore2]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>[begPos, endPos, objIgnore1, objIgnore2]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> begPos: [[PositionASL]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> endPos: [[PositionASL]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> objIgnore1: (optional) [[Object]] - object to ignore. When testing intersection from an object/unit/vehicle, pass that object here to prevent intersection inside of the object.
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> objIgnore2: (optional) [[Object]] - another object to ignore. When testing intersection of a line between two objects, pass the second object here to prevent intersection inside of it being reported

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - true if intersection
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lineIntersects]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[aimPos]] chopper, [[player]], chopper]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[cursorObject]], [[cursorTarget]], [[checkVisibility]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:46 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Please note the difference :
*[[terrainIntersect]]
*[[terrainIntersectASL]]
*[[lineIntersects]]
*[[lineIntersectsWith]]
*[[lineIntersectsObjs]] 
*[[intersect]]

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
